title: What's News: Business & Finance
text:
The exodus of advertisers from Elon Musk's Twitter is accelerating, and it could be hard for the billionaire to bring them back soon.

Musk heads to court this week to defend his multibillion-dollar pay package at Tesla in a suit brought by a shareholder of the electric-vehicle company.

U.S. voters said yes to tens of billions of dollars for road-paving, school-building and other local projects last Tuesday, promising a new wave of bonds for eager investors.

"Black Panther: Wakanda Forever" from Disney's Marvel Studios grossed $180 million in North America and $150 million overseas in its opening weekend.

What's News: Business & Finance
